resources.string: This app was made during the #30daysofKotlin program by Google Dev India. It was a fun experience in making this app. This app uses firebase for the backend services. Some of the advantages of using Kotlin in making this app are null pointer saftey, interoperability with JAVA, lambda functions, interface, etc. Below is the github link to the app\'s code. If you liked this app give it a star on Github
